Original:
這是一次有趣的經驗。基本上是一個學生酒吧，有很多便宜的飲料，包括從香港進口的生力啤酒。

男士無限暢飲700台幣，但最後你大多會喝啤酒，因為所有嘗試過的雞尾酒都認不出來，而且絕對不愉快！

收銀員女士非常友好，幫我為手機充電，但我很確定昨天是我第一次也是最後一次來。

也許如果我可以穿越時空，在沒有任何資金或薪水的情況下再次學習，我會考慮在這裡約會。
EN:
This is an interesting experience.Basically, it is a student bar. There are many cheap drinks, including Shengli Beer imported from Hong Kong.

Men drink 700 Taiwan dollars unlimited, but in the end you will drink beer, because you can't recognize all the cocktails you have tried, and it's absolutely unpleasant!

The cashier lady is very friendly to help me charge my mobile phone, but I am sure that I was the first and last time I came yesterday.

Perhaps if I can cross time and space, I will study again without any funds or salary, and I will consider dating here.

Original:
第一次來這裡是一年前，那時候有一個視覺系的bartender調酒滿好喝的所以印像不錯，不過最近去他不在了，bartender的調酒品質有明顯落差，不特別要求要濃一點會像在喝果汁。

新進的服務人員對店裡滿6人的毒針酒優惠不熟，跟我們凹說那是8人才有，求助櫃台也沒什麼回復非得要我去詢問訂位的公關才肯處理。毒針酒一組的數量沒講清楚，還直接告知說"因為店裡酒不夠所以只提供4管"，這個是我們的問題嗎？

最後上的毒針酒品質也是有點傻眼，數量又變成8管，所以一開始在騙還是後面想辦法稀釋?酒不夠我可以接受，另外補償或好好跟我們說明，我們不會為難店家，但這樣什麼也不交待的處理方式感受很差。

我跟朋友在貴店慶生的當下不想破壞氣氛，其實一行人都心裡滿失望的，雖然生日優惠的價格真的很便宜，怎麼說這樣的消費經驗還是讓人有點遺憾。
EN:
The first time came in the first time a year ago, there was a visual system of Visual Bartender to have a good cocktail, so the imprinting was not wrong, however recently to the ubiquitous, the bartender quality is significantly different, not particularly demanding to be strongA little will be like drinking juice.

Newly advanced service personnel are unfamiliar with the shop in the shop, with my Yu Yu 8 talented, and the detached desks also struck out and return to the non-desire to ask me to ask for a reservation.The number of poison needles and wine is clear, and directly tells "because the shop is not enough to provide only 4-tube", the problem is the problem?

Finally, the quality of poison needle wine is also a bit silly, the number and turns into 8 tubes, so at first the swindled back to the back of the want to approach ways to diluted?What is also unsubscribed very bad way to handle.

I am not wanting to destroy the atmosphere with my friends in the stubborn shop, in fact, a group of people are very disappointed, although the price of birthday concession is very cheap, somehow to say about the consumption experience remand a little regret.
